name: Chameleon Game idk whatever
description:
Play as a Chameleon thief trying to make your great escape! The facility knows about your camoflouge powers, and have created lights specifically designed to catch you! Your only hope is to match your color with the spotlight's in order to evade!

Use WASD/Arrows to move, and press Z,X,C to change into Red,Green and Blue respectively. The walls of the map are only visible to the color you change to, so you'll need to make a mental map while dodging the spotlights.
